column1: The Purple Pig////We celebrated our anniversary in Chicago and one of our favorite spots was the Purple Pig. We were sad that it was just the two of us
column2: because we wanted to order one of everything on the menu
column3: but that would turn us into the purple pigs
column4: so we went with a few favorites. The wait was minimal
column5: and gave us a chance to sample some cheese and wine before we dined.
